teaser: A look at how factory numbers are affecting our domestic economy this week.
title: Microsoft bought Nokia, but how is the real economy?
description: A look at how factory numbers are affecting our domestic economy this week.
contentencoded:
A survey of purchasing managers by a financial data firm called Markit showed a slight drop in factory numbers in August. Juli Niemann, analyst at Smith Moore & Company, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to explain today's manufacturing data and to preview Friday's unemployment figures. Click on the audio player above to hear more.

Correction: The original story misspelled Juli Niemann's first name. The text has been corrected.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, September 3, 2013
